title: Visa approval notices and visa stamps
dataVerified: Full name, passport number, visa type, validity period, issuing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Visa status (valid/expired/revoked). Link to embassy/consulate system (border control and employers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake visa approvals. Domain binding verifies embassy/consulate. Border entry requirement. Work authorization verification. Prevents visa fraud. Multi-page: Visa approval notices multi-page with terms.
